body.name: Security Camera Indoor, 2K Cameras for Home Security/Baby Monitor/Dog/Elderly, Smart 2.4G WiFi Pet Camera with Phone App, Motion Detection, Pan Tilt, 2 Way Audio, TF Card/Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 35 mins
features: 2K Full HD & Pan Tilt Zoom: with the resolution of 2304 x 1296, this wireless security camera can capture every detail in stunning clarity to ensure that you can know exactly what's happening in your home and no important details will be missed. Equipped with PTZ function for endless monitoring possibilities, which allows you to remotely control the pet cam's movement to keep an eye on every corner of your home. (Works with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi networks only)

Detection & Instant Notification: the home camera can detect motion, noise and track movements in real-time. Instant alerts will be sent to your phone to keep you informed of every potential danger at your home. Meanwhile videos or screenshots will be offered and saved on the app. You can customize the detection sensitivity and detection region to reduce unwanted notifications.

Clear Night Vision & Two-way Audio: thanks to the integrated IR system on this dog camera which provides 32.8 feet of night vision and allows you to enjoy industry-leading video clarity even at night. With the built-in microphone and speaker, this indoor surveillance camera makes it possible for you to communicate with visitors, family members or pets in real time from anywhere via the phone app. Perfect for pet owners, parents or caregivers.

Multi-user Access with Widely Application: the home security camera supports max 5 users to access the camera simultaneously via the APP "CloudEdge" and can be widely used for home/ office/ store. You can share the nanny camera with family members or friends to view the warm moments and keep up with everything by adding more camera on the app to watch 4 live videos at the same time.

Dual Storage, Security with Privacy: our plug-in house camera supports 24/7 monitoring with local recording (TF Card up to 128GB, not included) and cloud storage to keep your loved ones safe. This dog camera with phone app allows you to watch live footage from anywhere, at any time to give you peace of mind even away from home. To protect your privacy, you can switch the lens of the camera directly on the CloudEdge APP, you can also set the privacy schedule to turn off the real-time monitoring.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Small in Size Big On Security Live safer and smarter with STAMOL indoor wireless camera. The "CloudEdge" app allows you to monitor 4 cameras on one screen simultaneously, just login the app on your phone, you can view 4 real-time surveillance videos at the same time and stay connected with what matters. And you can use this camera for pet companion, elderly care, baby monitor, home security and so on to meet your different needs.

24/7 Continuous Recording The pan tilt camera supports continous recording on Micro SD Card or Cloud, which allows you to be awared of what's happening at home by viewing the footage. Never miss any important moment. Broad Your View with PTZ Function With 355° horizontal and 45° vertical viewing angles, you can rotate the camera via the mobile app easily to watch over the entire space. Night Vision & Two-way Audio The infrared LEDs provide you a clear picture even in pitch darkness up to 32.8ft, equipped with enhanced speaker and mcirophone, you can see, listen and talk to your loved ones or scare off the unexpected person via the convenient phone app from anywhere.

Noise Detection You can set the noise level for the baby camera monitor, a notification will be sent to you when the noise excessives the level you set, so that you can know timely when you are needed. Custom Alarm Area Customize the alerm area via the setting of the APP to let the baby camera focus on noteworthy areas and reduces unwanted alerts. Only receive the notification alerts which matters. Motion Detection & Tracking When motion is detected the wifi home camera will automatically tracks and follows the moving object. Meanwhile a short video will be recorded and the alert notification will be instantly pushed to your mobile phone.

Privacy in Your Hands Turn on the privacy mode on APP to prohibit the motion detection camera from living stream, recording, alarming etc, which can fully secure your privacy and give you a peace of mind. Work with Multi-devices With this indoor camera, you can view the real-time surveillance video through your mobile phone, tablet and PC no matter where you are to know the situation in your home and take response quickly. Multi View and Sharing The pet monitor supports 5 users to view the monitoring information simultaneously, you can share your camera with friends or family for good moments, and they can only have the access to the feature which you have authorized.
More Application Venues of Real-time Monitoring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for those looking to enhance their security and surveillance capabilities
reviews.reviewText: It offers excellent video quality, a wide range of features, and a competitive price point. While it may have some minor drawbacks, such as occasional connectivity issues, its overall performance and reliability make it a worthwhile investment for safeguarding your property and loved ones. The accompanying mobile app provides users with easy access to the camera's live feed and recorded footage. It's user-friendly and offers a range of customization options, such as setting up motion detection zones and adjusting camera settings remotely. While generally reliable, occasional app crashes and connectivity issues have been reported by some users. Setting up the Camera is relatively straightforward, thanks to the included user manual and the intuitive mobile app. The camera can be connected to your Wi-Fi network, allowing you to monitor your property remotely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for pets
reviews.reviewText: This was an excellent camera. It was easy to set up and the associated app is user friendly also.I use it mainly to keep track of my dogs when they are in the garage. The video quality is clear as well as the audio compared to other cameras I have tried previously. I love the fact that it is motion enabled so it is able to track and follow my dogs around allowing peace of mind when I check on them.My favorite feature however is the sound detection, for example if my dogs are barking the camera will move and track to where they are even if they aren't moving.The only con is I wish this was also set up for outdoor use so I could place them outside my house.Highly recommend for fellow pet owners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: The ease of set up is great. The way it sets up is secure. Unless someone is at the camera it can’t be added to an account, due to the camera requiring a scan of a QR code. That’s neat.I rate “ease of set up” by whether or not reading the instructions is required. In this case, I didn’t have to read them at all. Not everyone will be able to do that, but overall I found the setup to be very easy and quick.The quality of the picture and audio is second-to-none and matches or exceeds that of the “big brands”.When using the PTZ feature, the quality of the picture didn’t degrade or become choppy like it does on a lot of other systems. I’m extremely impressed with the quality of the picture. That also depends on the quality of a person’s network, but still. On my network, I’ve had other systems that had quality issues but this camera has no issues at all.The audio: I absolutely love the quality of audio on this camera. It’s not out of the ordinary to easily hear what a camera hears. Where this little camera shines is the speaker in the camera that transmits audio. It’s awesome.The camera controls in the app are good and easy to understand. My one suggestion would be to make it easy to adjust the camera (PTZ) in micro increments. That wasn’t easy for me to do. However, I was fairly quickly able to get the camera pointed where I wanted it.It’s easy to invert the image in the camera so it (the camera) can be hung upside down and suspended from the ceiling.It comes with an easy-to-mount clip/base so you can attach the camera base to the wall, the ceiling or wherever. The clip securely mounts to the camera and isn’t flimsy. It definitely holds it tightly.Connecting the camera to the wireless network was a breeze.The electric cord that comes with it is a great length, though I wish it was longer. That’s an issue with where I put the camera, not with the camera itself, though.Over all, I love this little camera and absolutely recommend it. It’s as good as any other camera and it’s better than most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research and landed on this one. Felt like for the cost, quality, and convenience. This was the winner, and I have no hesitation to recommend it to a friend. It is free, it definitely works, the video quality is quite good, and the app is pretty easy to use. Set up, took me a few times, but with reading reviews and following instructions again it was pretty simple to remedy. I like the video quality and how safe it makes us feel
